headline: Need something more advanced? Let's build a secure, personalized tech plan that fits you.
description: Custom I.T. solutions in {{city_upper}} for privacy, security, and performance. We help design advanced networks, lock down smart homes, and build tailored tech systems.

sections.heading: Did You Know?
paragraph: Most off-the-shelf solutions prioritize convenience over security. Default settings often leak data, expose unnecessary services, or rely on third-party clouds you cannot control.
If you are running a homelab, hosting sensitive data, or integrating smart devices, you need more than generic tools and default configurations.
Advanced setups let you self-host services, restrict access, and reduce reliance on external platforms while improving both privacy and performance.

sections.heading: What We Do
paragraph: We help privacy-conscious individuals, professionals, and small businesses implement secure, efficient systems that go beyond basic tech support.
items: Design secure, high-performance network environments tailored to your needs
Lock down smart home platforms and reduce reliance on cloud services
Set up private file sharing, encrypted backup, or self-hosted services
Optimize or repurpose hardware for privacy-first applications
Develop or configure automation tools and privacy-focused software
Build custom websites or applications with security and data control in mind

sections.heading: How It Works
paragraph: We start with a consultation to understand your goals, technical environment, and potential risks.
Based on that, we create a detailed plan using open, trusted tools to meet your performance, security, or privacy requirements.
You stay in full control of your systems with clear documentation and long-term maintainability built in from the start.
